title: hextech crafting glitch
body: hi i recently rolled 3 skins into a skin permanent and then as i rolled a game matchmaking started and now all my stuff just dissapeared

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is more than likely just a display bug, did the items reappear upon restarting your client?

If your items are still missing, please [contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) directly for further assistance.
no i tried restart and still not there so im down 3 skin shards. will contact support
